name: Dwerve
description:
Whispers of a long forgotten darkness echo throughout the valley of the great mountain. Dwerve is a tower defense dungeon crawler RPG with a tactical twist — strategic turret and trap placement decide the outcome of each battle!
Warsmiths were elite dwarven warrior-engineers that used turrets and traps instead of traditional weapons. All of the warsmiths perished in a great war long ago, but when an ancient threat emerges once again, a young blue-haired tinkerer unearths magical stones to power the arcane technologies used by warsmiths of old. Armed with turrets and traps, he adventures into dungeons crawling with dwarf-thirsty monsters to hack 'em to pieces and burn 'em to ash.FeaturesFight with Turrets and Traps to spill the guts of dwarf-thirsty monsters and bosses
Upgrade your Arsenal of lethal contraptions, each with its own unique skill tree
Story-Based Campaign with rich dialogue, diverse characters, and unpredictable plot
Explore Ancient Dungeons to unravel the history of the dwarfs and trolls
Complete Daring Quests on your adventure into the depths of ancient dungeonsAlpha AccessWant to become a tester? Subscribe at http://Dwerve.com for a chance to win Alpha Access.
